Event.name: Winos for Rhinos
Event.description:
Rhinos have existed on Earth for more than 50 million years but with increased poaching, even in protected areas, every species of rhino is now threatened with extinction.
By placing a bid and the winning the item you are helping to ensure the health and well-being of our gentle giants, Timu and Kianga here at the Racine Zoo.

Event.name: World Wine Wednesday
Event.description:
World Wine Wednesday: Enjoy specially selected wines and the following: Unlimited sampling of wines, World Wine Wednesday glass, two free drink tickets, and Hors d’oeuvres. 
Tickets can be purchased online, at Uncorkt or at the Zoo administration office (200 Goold Street) for $30 per person. 

Must be 21 or older to attend.

Event.description:

Enjoy 5$ Admission this day.

Event.name: Mother's Day 5K Run/Walk
Event.description:
Get ready to run (or walk) wild! Join us at the Racine Zoo for our Wild 5K Run/Walk for the Animals at our beautiful lakefront location in Downtown Racine. 
All proceeds from this event benefit the animals of the Racine Zoo. 
Each registration includes: 
-Event t-shirt 
-Free post-race refreshments 
*Limited supplies available* 
Register: Now-May 12th: 
$30 (Zoo Members) 
$35 (Non-Zoo Members) 
DAY OF - $40 at door for everyone.

Event.name: Mother's Day Brunch
Event.description: Let’s celebrate Mom! Join us for a special Mother’s Day brunch at the Zoo. Tickets are $25/pp for Zoo members and $35/pp for Non-zoo members and include: Catered brunch, Giraffe Encounter, Flower for Mom, Commemorative photo, Special crafts for kids to make for Mom.

Event.name: Roar and Pour
Event.description:
Join us for Roar and Pour for unlimited beer tasting and fun! Tickets include: unlimited beer tasting, a Roar and Pour glass, two drink tickets, and hors d'oeuvres.
Tickets can be purchased online or at the Zoo office for $30 per person. A ticket must be presented to enter the event.

Must be 21 or older to attend.

Event.name: Father's Day Putt Putt Golf Tournament
Event.description:
Your ticket includes: Catered lunch, Daddy Drafts (draft beer), Participation in the Putt-Putt Golf Tournament (18-holes, shotgun start at 9 a.m.) 

Access to the “Man Cave”, Family Photo, Craft station for kid’s Father’s Day crafts.
Tickets are only $25 for Zoo members and $30 for Non-members. Space is limited so grab your tickets today!

Event.name: Animal Crackers Concert
Event.description:
Bria Skonberg: Enjoy the upbeat music, beautiful lake view and delicious food from the numerous dining options on site. 
The doors to the Racine Zoo open at 5:30 p.m. and the shows begin at 7:00 p.m. 
Canadian singer, trumpeter, and songwriter Bria Skonberg is described by The Wall Street Journal as one of the “most versatile and imposing musicians of her generation.

Event.name: Cigar Dinner
Event.description:
What says relaxation more than enjoying a perfectly cooked gourmet steak dinner with all the trimmings while sitting by the lake?  The Cigar Dinner is all about indulging in rare cigars from around the world with other cigar enthusiasts in a beautiful, scenic outdoor setting.
An outstanding wine selection is offered by Timers Beverage Center with cigars offered by Jim Pendergast. Plus, bid on unique silent and voice auction items throughout the night.  All proceeds benefit the animals and programs of the Racine Zoo.

The doors to the Racine Zoo open at 5:30 p.m. and the shows begin at 7:00 p.m. 
Gerald Albright, nominated for multiple GRAMMY® Awards and one of the biggest stars of R&B, Contemporary and Straight-ahead Jazz.

Event.name: Animals and Artisans
Event.description:
OPEN CALL FOR ARTISANS/CRAFTERS! 

Fee for vendors: $50.00 for early bird registration on or before May 26, 2017; $100 on or after May 27, 2017, Booth space is 12’x12’, Limited electricity available, Event runs rain or shine, Notification of acceptance – on Monday, June 6, 2017. 
Free with zoo admission: $8 ages 16 and older, $7 ages 62 and older, $6 ages 3-15; free ages 2 and younger and zoo members.

Event.name: Animal Crackers Concert
Event.description:
Booker T. Jones: Enjoy the upbeat music, the beautiful lake view and delicious food from the numerous dining options on site. The doors to the Racine Zoo open at 5:30 p.m. and the shows begin at 7:00 p.m. 
Jones was one of the architects of the Memphis soul sound of the 1960s as the leader of Booker T. & the MG’s, who scored a number of hits.

Event.name: Whiskers & Whiskey - Fundraiser Event
Event.description:
Enjoy a 5 course whiskey and meal pairing, silent auction and BIG cat chat from our Animal Care department.
 All proceeds benefit the animals and programs of the Racine Zoo. Email aolsen@racinezoo.org for reservations.

Event.name: Car, Truck, and Bike Show
Event.description:
Join hundreds of other car, truck & motorcycle enthusiasts. Over 75 trophies Best of Show awards for cars, motorcycles & trucks, Great prizes & gifts, Local food trucks and vendors on-site, the Racine Zoo will be offering beer, soda, and water, Event held rain or shine, Great music all day long 

For more information on participating in or sponsoring this year’s show, 262-636-9274

Event.name: Animal Crackers Concert
Event.description:
Larry Carlton: Enjoy the upbeat music, the beautiful lake view and delicious food from the numerous dining options on site. The doors to the Racine Zoo open at 5:30 p.m. and the shows begin at 7:00 p.m. 
American guitarist who built his career as a studio musician in the 1970s and ’80s for acts such as Steely Dan and Joni Mitchell.

Event.name: Zoo Debut: “A Wild Affair.”
Event.description:
Enjoy dinner and dancing by the lakeside at Racine’s premier black tie affair. Live music entertainment, a Seated dinner, open bar, Attire is black tie or formal animal print apparel. Live and silent auctions, and special raffles. Proceeds benefit the Racine Zoo. 
Tickets are $125 *Early bird special price through 08.13.17* 
Reservations required, call 262-636-9312 to reserve your seating or email aolsen@racinezoo.org for reservations.

Event.name: Great Lakes Brew Fest
Event.description:
(The Zoo will Be Closed This Day For Visiting Animals)
 Unlimited Sampling, Limited to 4500 Attendees, Home Brew Island; sample award winning home brews Cider Cellar,Live Music,Rare and Limited Release Beers, Great Food Available for Purchase, Souvenir Pint Glass for all Attendees. 
For tickets go to www.GreatLakesBrewFest.com

Event.name: Boo at the Zoo
Event.description:
Calling all Trick’or’Treaters!! 
Enjoy safe trick-or-treating all day with the animals at the Racine Zoo. Boo at the Zoo is included with regular admission. 
Zoo members get in FREE! 
Take part in the Snacktivities, Straw bale Maze, Spooky Crafts, Creep Crawly’s, and more!
